alert.note: Alert for Prince Georges (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:40PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of central Maryland, including the following county, Prince Georges. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1237 PM EST, rain has come to an end across the area, with 2.5 to 4 inches of rain having fallen in the past 24 hours. The Western Branch Patuxent River at Upper Marlboro continues to steadily rise in Minor Flood Stage. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowie... Largo... Upper Marlboro... Kettering... Mitchellville... Lake Arbor... Woodmore... Lanham-Seabrook... Goddard... Glenn Dale... Springdale... - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
